name: Bad Control Game (Rough Draft)
description:
Up, left and right keys to play :)

Game for GMTK Jam 2020 with theme "Out of Control".

Sorry it's very bare bones, I was extremely low on motivation whilst working on this. The game simply restarts the final level when you beat it.

GMS2 source code is available to download. It's trigonometry hell.

The game is basically a sidescrolling but the controls don't do what you think they'll do. Sort of a janky block sliding puzzle or something.
